title: Random Unresponsiveness
body: I'm not sure if it's just my computer, but has anyone else experienced random unresponsiveness in abilities and movement commands.  For example, I'll be standing still and then press on the ground.  I'll see the green arrow work, but my movement won't go through.  Sometimes I will finally walk after 1-3 seconds and sometimes it won't happen at all.  Any ideas?

replies.body:
This is a common symptom of *Packet Loss*. This occurs if there are issues between your PC and our servers that cause the bits of information you send or receive from the servers to become lost along the way. I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps to get your local network settings compatible with League.

Let me know if this caused any noticeable change.
